text:
Near(near.co) is the largest location intelligence platform providing real-time information on places, people and products. The Near platform powers Allspark, its flagship product enabling customers to visualize, engage and analyze audience data including their location and behaviour for data-driven decisions.

Founded in 2012, Near is headquartered in Singapore with offices in San Francisco, London, Bangalore, Singapore, Tokyo and Sydney.

Looking for candidates for various engineering positions. Interested candidates can apply at near.co/careers. Reach us at careers@near.co for any queries.
